Pacifica Glow Baby Super C Serum

Brand: Pacifica

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Aqua, l-ascorbic acid (vitamin c), glycerin, cetyl alcohol, squalane, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, tocopheryl acetate, stearyl alcohol, glycolipids, glyceryl stearate citrate, glyceryl laurate, tocopherol (vitamin e), boswellia serrata resin extract, terminalia ferdinandiana (kakadu plum) fruit extract, algin, bisabolol,

alcohol, glycolipids, glyceryl stearate citrate, glyceryl laurate, tocopherol (vitamin e), boswellia serrata resin extract, terminalia ferdinandiana (kakadu plum) fruit extract, algin, bisabolol, glyceryl stearate, sodium phytate, xanthan gum, phenoxyethanol, riboflavin phosphate, ethylhexylglycerin.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
